content.question: A cart carrying a block moves to the right with constant speed. The block does not slip on the cart. Consider two systems: System <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> consists of only the block, and System <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> consists of the block and the cart. Which of the following correctly compares the speeds, <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, of System <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and System <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, and the magnitudes of the momenta, <math alttext="p sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="p sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, of the two systems, respectively?
